Question: Sevvy B.V. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sevvy B.V.

Product: Sevvy Smart Cooker

- Patented low-temperature cooking technology
- Uses 90% less energy compared to ovens or other cookers
- Retains more than 40% of the food's nutrients
- Countertop appliance with quick cooking times
- Utilizes electrical currents to heat food uniformly
- Received CES 2024 Best of Innovation award in the Home Appliances category
